# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9500. This represents an outstanding opportunity to acquire a product worth $10000 at a highly competitive rate. I trust this offer will be favorable to you and look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your business or lifestyle. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
